compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: User consent mechanisms are in place but may not be fully transparent.
gaps: No option for users to withdraw consent easily.
recommendations: Implement clearer consent forms and processes for withdrawal.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data minimization principles are followed.
requirements.evidence: Data collection is limited to necessary information.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some features incorporate data protection measures.
gaps: Not all features are designed with privacy in mind.
recommendations: Conduct a privacy impact assessment for new features.

critical_gaps: Insufficient data protection measures in new features.
